item.title: Create Custom World in Unity ECS
item.description: :::info This article assumes you Unity ECS knowledge mentioned in the article (:door:link) (some part of it is deprecated). :::

item.title: The Evolution Of Variables
item.description: Take a look at this equation: ATK = STR * 10. It’s simple, isn’t it?

item.title: Welcome to Ghost
item.description: Hey! Welcome to Ghost, it’s great to have you :)

item.title: Out to Sea
item.description: I had this story from one who had no business to tell it to me, or to any other. I may credit the seductive influence of an old vintage upon the narrator for the beginning of it, and my own skeptical incredulity during the days that followed for the balance of the strange tale.
